concept.title: Creating a custom app configuration profile
concept.shortdesc: HCL Sametime for iOS supports custom managed configurations. With these configurations, an [spell out EMM] (EMM) administrator can preconfigure many settings and policies for HCL Sametime for iOS.

conbody.p: Any setting an administrator defines by using the EMM takes precedence over a similar setting or policy on the Sametime server. Setting custom app configuration varies by EMM. All EMM providers support the idea of Apple managed configuration that use custom keys and values. However, some EMM providers support a definition of these parameters that use an appâ€™s AppConfig XML definition file the AppConfig Community defines it.
HCL Sametime for iOS provides the EMM Configuration XML file for HCL Sametime for iOS file through the support article which defines the supported configuration settings for this app.
If your EMM supports an AppConfig.xml file, use this file rather than manually entering managed configuration keys and values.
Not all EMM providers support AppConfig.xml file, and if your provider does not support this format yet, you can still enter in configuration keys and values separately.
See the HCL Sametime iOS App Configuration Reference for a listing of keys and values that HCL Sametime for iOS supports.
